name: **NEW** Bespoke printed canvas scrapbook album
description:
Place you scrapbook pages in something bespoke and completely unique.

A beautiful postbound album approx 14" x 13 " to take 12" x 12" plastic wallet inserts; covered in a professional grade canvas, designed and printed to your requirements. 

From a simple photo to a complex WordArt, graphics, scanned drawings and paintings, company logos and branding - all can be incorporated into the front and back covers. Additional embellishments can be adhered to the canvas to create a wonderful personalised and dimensional album.

The interior is lined with a co-ordinating paper and comes with 10 plastic wallets (giving 20 sides on which to place your photos and memorabilia.)

These make beautiful and personal gifts for a landmark birthday, wedding, anniversary, engagement, birth, retirement, leaving present and original wedding guest book or album.

These albums are also perfect for company reception and meeting areas to display testimonials and portfolios.

Neither mass produced or machine made, these albums are lovingly designed and carefully crafted from scratch and can have names, bookplates, CD holders and internal frames added - please convo me for further details.

THE PROCESS
You place you order
I contact you about your design requirements
I create your design
I send you a proof to check 
You sign the proof off or let us know of any changes
I print your canvas and make your album using the artwork as the cover
I ship the album to you 1st class post

name: Handcrafted 16" x 13" traditional photo album with 20 inserts - "21st Black Deco"
description:
Place your beautiful photographs in something bespoke, luxurious and unique! 

Neither mass produced or machine made. This album has been lovingly designed and handcrafted from scratch using the finest materials. 

Approx 16" x 13" to take 14" x 12" traditional black inserts and protective glassine paper; double boarded for added stability and bound with 3 hidden metal posts; beautiful black handmade indian cotton paper with black and silver art deco design coats the exterior with a thick, high quality, grosgrain ribbon trim and faux gem and metal 21st trim to the front. 

The interior is lined with the reverse cover paper with a printed photo collage and holds 20 internal black pages giving 40 workable sides on which to place your photos and memorabilia (additional wallets available)

This album can be customised to suit your needs - we can cover the album in a wide range of handmade papers from the UK, USA, India, Italy and Japan, decorative and textured wallpapers, fabric and even plain brown paper if you fancy decorating one yourself. We can add names, metal bookplates, internal frames and so on, please convo me for further details.

This album is the perfect treat for yourself or gift for any new or seasoned scrapbooker!


**RECENT REVIEWS**

"IT'S ARRIVED!!!! It's absolutely fabulous and I am overjoyed & tremendously excited about how it's turned out. I know my Dad is just going to love it. I can't thank you enough, especially for the fact that you worked on it so quickly for us" Anna, Surrey, England

"I have just received the most beautiful Scrapbook from the lovely Andrea Daniels, absolutely gorgeous!" Kelly Hartnett, Vintage Fancies

"Awesome album, lovely rich paper saturated with color and texture. I loved that you customised my book with the birds. It turned out way better than I imagined! Thanks so much!" Ptalk, Etsy

name: Gone Fishing - handcrafted 12" x 12" scrapbook / photo album
description:
A marine themed album approx 12.5" x 13.5 " to take 12" x 12" wallet or paper inserts; double boarded for added stability and bound with 3 hidden metal posts.

This album has been lovingly designed and handcrafted from scratch using the finest materials. This album is covered in a beautiful marine themed cream paper with metallic and gold edged fish and is finished with a teal leather twine. The interior is lined with sea green handmade paper and contains 10 internal wallets giving 20 workable sides on which to craft or journal (additional wallets available).

Can be customised to suit your needs - we can cover the album in a wide range of handmade papers from the UK, USA and Japan, decorative and textured wallpapers, fabric and even plain brown paper if you fancy decorating one yourself. We can add names, metal bookplates, internal frames and so on, please convo me for further details.

This album is the perfect treat for a fishing lover or marine enthusiast.

name: Doctor, Doctor - handmade 12" x 12" scrapbook / photo album
description:
A skeleton themed postbound album approx 12.5" x 13.5 " to take 12" x 12" wallet or paper inserts; double boarded for added stability and bound with 3 hidden metal posts.

This album has been lovingly designed and handcrafted from scratch using the finest materials - skeleton paper coat the exterior with a brown leather twine and metal doctor themed trinkets. Interior is lined with the same paper and contains 10 internal wallets giving 20 workable sides on which to craft or journal (additional wallets available).

Can be customised to suit your needs - we can cover the album in a wide range of handmade papers from the UK, USA and Japan, decorative and textured wallpapers, fabric and even plain brown paper if you fancy decorating one yourself. We can add names, metal bookplates, internal frames and so on, please convo me for further details.

This album is the perfect gift for a Doctor, physiotherapist or medical practitioner!

name: Personalised Wordart - Daddy/Mommy likes .....
description:
Celebrate the life of someone special by having a personalised WordArt print designed and printed capturing all their characteristics, interests, activities and family ties. A perfect gift for someone special be it a family member, friend or colleague. The print is hand finished with a miniature photo frame containing the word LOVE but can include any word of your choosing.

The WordArt print is individually designed. A PDF file of the print will be sent to you within 3-5 days for proofing. Once approved it is then printed on museum grade archival quality papers using Ultra Chrome K3 inks and with a white border for easy handling and framing (which is strongly advised).

PRINT ONLY £65.00 
PRINT & MOUNT £75.00 
PRINT, MOUNT AND BOX FRAME £135.00 (includes additional postage and packaging costs)

Samples shown are in chocolate and purple colour schemes - other colours available, please contact me if you have a colour scheme in mind.

DIMENSIONS 
Artwork is approx 14" x 14" (35cm x 35cm). 
Mounted size 19.5" x 19.5" - fits a standard 20" x 20" (52cm x 52cm) Ikea Ribba frame.

name: Orla Kiely - Car Park Scrapbook / photo album
description:
THIS IS A ONE OF A KIND ALBUM - the paper is no longer available so I won't be able to make any more of these.

A beautiful postbound album approx 12.5" x 13.5 " to take 12" x 12" wallet or paper inserts; double boarded for added stability and bound with 3 hidden metal posts.

This album has been lovingly designed and handcrafted from scratch using the finest materials - gorgeous Orla Kiely multi car paper, thick brown suede ribbon and a traditonal buckle decorate to the front. Interior is lined with Orla Kiely orange multi car paper with deep red satin ribbon to spine. 10 internal wallets giving 20 workable sides on which to craft or journal (additional wallets available)

Can be customised to suit your needs - we can cover the album in a wide range of handmade papers from the UK, USA and Japan, decorative and textured wallpapers, fabric and even plain brown paper if you fancy decorating one yourself. We can add names, metal bookplates, internal frames and so on, please convo me for further details.

This album is the perfect treat for yourself or gift for any new or seasoned scrapbooker!

name: Bespoke Scrapbook Service - Marry Me! package
description:
Such a romantic way to say 'Marry Me'.

Pop the question and show your love with a beautiful handcrafted album full of your photos and memories. Wow your bride/or groom to be with 20 simply designed scrapbook pages enclosed in a handcrafted 12" x 12" album with a cover of your choice. 

Pages are sympathetically crafted according to the photos and memorabilia provided; papers and embellishments are carefully selected to match the photos, memorabilia and recipient.

A handcrafted 12" x12" album with a cover of your choice.

Delivery costs will be calculated and charges separately prior to posting.

name: For my Teacher - PaperArt
description:
'For my Teacher' PaperArt piece is a beautiful personalised gift to give to a child's favorite teacher at school. Such a lovely alternative to a box of chocolates or a candle holder!

Pretty decorative paper is handcut in layers to give a 3D effect and the word 'teacher' is die cut to give dimension. A beautiful poem by Forest Witchcraft on cloudy vellum is attached and beads showing the teacher's initials finish it off.

Simply send us a photo of your child and the teacher's initials and incorporate it into the piece.

OPTIONS
15" x 15" Garden flowers (shown)
15" x 15" Bespoke colour/paper options - please select this option and I will contact you with details

Supplied with or without mount.

name: Personalised WordArt - I Remember
description:
Celebrate the life of someone special by having a personalised WordArt print designed and printed capturing all your memories of home, holidays, interests, quirks and happy times. A perfect gift for Dad, Grandad, brother, husband, best friend, Uncle or Guardian

The WordArt print is individually designed. A PDF file of the print will be sent to you within 3-5 days for proofing. Once approved it is then printed on museum grade archival quality papers using Ultra Chrome K3 inks and with a white border for easy handling and framing (which is strongly advised). 

Sample shown is in shades of blue and brown - other colours available, please contact me if you have a colour scheme in mind.

DIMENSIONS
13" x 13" (35cm x 35cm)
Can be bought with 20" mount and with white/dark wood box frame options.

name: Garden mama - pre designed scrapbook album - perfect for Mother's Day
description:
SORRY, THIS PRODUCT HAS SOLD OUT

If you are interested in commissioning an album similar to this, please do contact me.
________________________________________________________________


This unique and beautiful pre-designed scrapbook album is the perfect gift to give to your Mum for Mother's Day, birthday or Christmas.

This 7" x 7" square handmade album is crafted from bare board and contains 4 concertina pages (10 sides). The pages are pre designed with pretty decorative photo and journalling mounts and finished with beautiful garden related papers from the Garden Party collection from Tilda and embellishments. On the inside of the front and back cover is a lovely poem about Mums. 

It comes packaged in a rectangle black presentation box with a decorated front panel and accompanied by a tag notebook with MUM on the front; all wrapped up in pink tissue paper.

All you have to do is fill it with your photos and memorabilia - it's that easy.

This is the only album I will be making like this, so it really is very unique and will make the perfect gift for a very special Mum.

Please convo me with any questions.

name: Personalised PhotoArt - square
description:
Beautiful personalised pieces of PhotoArt combining your favorite photos and our paper creativity in colours to match your memorabilia.

Perfect for weddings, 18th, 21st and other landmark birthdays.

Pretty papers, selected embellishments and die cut titles make this piece really stand out. 

These pieces are truly unique and make beautiful gifts.

NOTE: Artwork only option requires a box frame.

name: Bespoke Scrapbook Service - Design your own package
description:
Fancy decorating your own album but not sure of how to go about it?

We take all the hard work out by handcrafting a 20 page 10" x 7" or 12" x 12" scrapbook album to your requirements, preparing the album layout, choosing appropriate colour schemes and cutting and mounting simple photo mounts and sections for you to add your own photos and words - all you have to do is fill it with photos and memories and add your own decorations.

A handcrafted 10" x 7" or 12" x 12" album with a cover of your choice.

Delivery costs will be calculated and charges separately prior to posting.

name: Bespoke Scrapbook Service- Happy Birthday package
description:
If you are looking for a special way to say Happy Birthday or Happy Anniversary, this is the gift to give. 

Commemorate your family member(s), friend or work colleague's life by giving a beautifully handcrafted album with 20 simply designed scrapbook pages. Pages are sympathetically crafted according to the photos and memorabilia provided; papers and embellishments are carefully selected to match the photos, memorabilia and recipient.

A handcrafted 10" x 7" album with a cover of your choice.

Delivery costs will be calculated and charges separately prior to posting.

name: Astoria handcrafted photo album
description:
A beautiful postbound album approx 16" x 13" to take 15" x 12" black heavyweight leaves and protective glassine paper. Double boarded for added stability and bound with 3 hidden metal posts.

This album has been lovingly designed and handcrafted from scratch using the finest materials - gorgeous Art Deco themed olive green and burgundy handmade indian paper cover the front with simple black grosgrain band and bow, the inside is lined with handmade black paper.  15 black internal leaves and glassin pages giving 30 workable sides on which to place your photos (additional leaves available).

Can be customised to suit your needs - we can cover the album in a wide range of handmade papers from the UK, USA and Japan, decorative and textured wallpapers. We can add names, metal bookplates, internal frames and so on, please convo me for further details.

This album is the perfect treat for yourself or gift for someone special.

name: Weekend in Paris handcrafted scrapbook / photo album
description:
A beautiful postbound album approx 12.5" x 13.5 " to take 12" x 12" wallet or paper inserts; double boarded for added stability and bound with 3 hidden metal posts.

This album has been lovingly designed and handcrafted from scratch using the finest materials - gorgeous Paris themed paper from Cavallini in shades of orange, green, red and beige coat the exterior; a vintage decorative metal Eiffel Tower and carved pink rose sit on a green die cut photo panel with vintage lace in cream and dark green, (beaded with pink glass beads) decorate the front. Interior is lined with the same Paris themed paper and olive handmade sugar paper. 10 internal wallets giving 20 workable sides on which to craft or journal (additional wallets available)

Can be customised to suit your needs - we can cover the album in a wide range of handmade papers from the UK, USA and Japan, decorative and textured wallpapers, fabric and even plain brown paper if you fancy decorating one yourself. We can add names, metal bookplates, internal frames and so on, please convo me for further details.

This album is the perfect treat for yourself or gift for any new or seasoned scrapbooker!

name: SOLD - Renovated PIP teak vintage sideboard
description:
Grab yourself an original piece of furniture.

This pretty one of a kind teak sideboard is from the 1970's. Originally varnished, it has been lovingly stripped and painted in a soft chalk white paint. We then hand cut flowers, bird cages and birds from wallpaper by Dutch company, PIP Studios, and adhered them to the sideboard to create a pretty collage.

It has been finished with a coat of clear varnish and lined with the PIP wallpaper from which the flowers have been cut.

It is a beautiful piece and would be perfect for any shabby chic setting, little girl's (or big girl's) room or on it's own in a hallway. An completely original piece!

Dimensions:

Width: 125cm
Depth: 42cm
Height: 67cm

Free Collection and delivery to Harborne, Birmingham.
Birmingham delivery: £25

For the rest of the UK - Buy for collection and arrange your own shipping by using SHIPLY (www.shiply.com). They run an online marketplace where couriers and transport companies actually bid and compete for your business like an auction.  So not only will you save a lot of money but it also removes the hassle of having to phone around for quotes, Shiply is an eBay certified solution.

DIMENSIONS

description:
Celebrate the life of a very special lady - your Mum! 

This personalised WordArt captures all those little things that Mum just loves - her music, TV programmes, friends, family, holidays and hobbies. This is the perfect gift for Mother's Day, birthdays and Christmas.

Inside there is  a 3" x 5" photo frame, notepad and pocket.

description:

name: Chiyogami 10.5" x 7.5" scrapbook album / photo album
description:
A beautifully designed and handcrafted gatefold album approx 10 1/2" x 7 1/2" covered in green/gold Japanese Chiyogami botanical paper and finished with a chocolate and white trim ribbon and 2 cotton buttons to the front. Embossed yellow/gold interior paper to the inside cover with 2 pockets and tags with 6 internal pages set to both sides giving 24 workable sides on which to craft or journal.

Can be customised with a book plate, frame and/or title.

name: My Travels 10" x 7.5" Scrapbook / photo album
description:
This beautiful My Travels handcrafted box album is approx 10" x 7 1/2"

The album is covered in world map paper (southern hemisphere option shown) and finished with a decorative metal bookplate to the front. Secured using hidden magnets. Brown paper to the inside cover with fixed photo frame with trinket/tag and pocket to the front and 6 fixed envelope pockets in which to put tickets, notes and travel memorabilia along with a CD pocket to the back. 6 double internal pages set to central spine with posts giving 24 workable sides on which to craft or journal (option of 6 additional pages are available giving 48 workable sides).

Can be fully customisable - we can print the title for you to fill the bookplate on the front and can add names and places to the frame.

Cover paper is available in 2 options - choose from:
Northern hemisphere map (North America, Europe)
Southern hemishpere map (South America, Australasia, Far East)

A perfect little album to document a trip, holiday or event.

Mounted size 19.5" x 19.5" - fits a standard 20" x 20" (52cm x 52cm) Ikea Ribba frame.

name: Bespoke Scrapbook Service - 10 Page Starter Album
description:
Kick start your scrapbooks with this value-for-money starter album - 15% discount off the normal page rate.

10 pages designed and traditionally crafted or digitally produced to your specific requirements using your photos, memorabilia and words. A perfect gift to give or treasure.

As soon as we receive your order we will contact you to discuss your requirements.

Includes a choice of album to put your pages into.

name: Personalised PhotoArt
description:
Beautiful personalised pieces of PhotoArt combining your favorite photos and our paper creativity in a choice of colourways and sizes.

These pieces are truly unique and make beautiful unique gifts.

Bespoke sizes available - please email me at: andrea@thescrapbooker.co.uk for price and details

Please note:
Price shown is for mounted artwork - frames are not included.
Artwork requires a box frame.

name: Romantic Butterfly PaperArt
description:
Lenny Kravitz lends his beautiful lyrics to this pretty 9" x 9" PaperArt piece.

10 pretty butterflies cut from the prettiest of patterned paper, irridescent swirls that catch the light in the background and the lyrics, printed on soft vellum, keep this piece airy and delicate.

A perfect gift for valentines, birthday, christmas or just to say how much someone means to you.

Supplied without the frame (but crafted to fit a standard 9" x 9" Ikea box frame)

OPTIONS:
Oriental - pale green, red, white (shown)
Parisien - Black and cream (shown)
Romantic - Pale blue, pink, white, cream and green
Bespoke - Your personal choice of colours and/or lyrics

More options available soon ...
